issue.title: [Doc][Guide] Existing Contributors page - update
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15349](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15349). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
#### **contributing.rst page should become a landing page for all contributors**

The landing page would connect different topics and would use Sphinx boxes for better visibility. The main topics would be:
1. Intro into contributing
1. Community
1. New Contributor's Guide
1. Report bugs and propose features
1. Advanced code contribution
   
   Existing Contributing page content :
    \* _Intro_ stays on the landing page
    \* {_}Code of Conduc{_}t and _Mailing List_ moves to the Community page
    \* _Report bugs and propose features_ moves to it's own page
    \* _Improve documentation_ moves to the New Contrib Guide docs section
    \*\* link from the landing page must be added
    \*\* link to the building of the documentation must be added
    \* _Contribute code_ moves to the Guide
    \* _Experimental repositories_ and _Guidance for specific features_ would live in Advanced code contribution where the links to the existing docs would be added.
